short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Produces a link preview with UW Flow course information for UWaterloo Undergraduate Calendar course links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UW Float is designed for University of Waterloo students who want to quickly access detailed course information while browsing the Undergraduate Calendar. This extension provides an info card containing information from UWFlow.com when hovering over a course link on any webpage. You can also click on the course code in the preview to be taken to the course's UW Flow page for a deeper dive. With UW Float, students can easily gather course information without having to switch between tabs or search through the calendar. Save time and streamline your course planning by installing the extension today!

This extension is not affiliated with UWFlow.com or the University of Waterloo.
